Summary: There were 3 bright lights,Large V shape.watched them several minutes.real large.unusual.,
trends: There have been 417 other sightings in Phoenix
There were 7 other sightings in Phoenix on or around January 16th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsMy husband & I were driving home.I saw first 2 bright yellow lights staying side by side . They were much brighter than any other lights. There were Airplanes in the sky too, these lights were different. They seemed to rotate some , then I could see 3 lights.looked like a large V .My Husband could see them too.It seemed to hover in the distance..A few miles away.We keep driving home , but watched the lights.After 15 to 20 minutes the lights just went away..( they had faded away once but came back in a minute or two).. The last time they did not come back.I took pictures , but they are not good.The lights were in the West part of the sky.It was dark.We drive this way home often at same time of day , the lights were unusual.
